# jira_issue_type (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
// The types will be globally available in JIRA
resource "jira_issue_type" "task" {
  description = "A Task."
  name = "Task"
  avatar_id = 10318
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `avatar_id` (Number)
- `description` (String)
- `is_subtask` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
